PerfectNetExp.abs: 中立议员 crossbencher中立议员席 crossbench中端里 Chungdan-ri

list.abs: 中立议员(crossbencher)是部份实行议会制国家内独立的议会成员,在英国的上议院及澳大利亚的参议院均有设立。中立议员的英文名称crossbencher得名于他们在英国上议院内的.
中立主义者 neutralist中立人士 crossbencher中立化 neutralization

means.word_mean: 1. any of the seats in the House of Commons used by members who do not vote regularly with either the Government or the Opposition

auth_sentence.content: Both will sit as crossbench or independent peers.
auth_sentence.res_content: Both will sit as crossbench or independent peers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Both will sit as crossbench or independent peers.

auth_sentence.content: Meanwhile, Lord Ramsbotham, a crossbench peer and former general, called for a radical review of defence expenditure.
auth_sentence.res_content: Meanwhile, Lord Ramsbotham, a crossbench peer and former general, called for a radical review of defence expenditure.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Meanwhile, Lord Ramsbotham, a crossbench peer and former general, called for a radical review of defence expenditure.

auth_sentence.content: Earlier this year, the crossbench peer called for greater priority to caring for and supporting rape victims.
auth_sentence.res_content: Earlier this year, the crossbench peer called for greater priority to caring for and supporting rape victims.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Earlier this year, the crossbench peer called for greater priority to caring for and supporting rape victims.
